thread.title: Leverkusen's Hernández on Roma thriller

title: Leverkusen's Hernández on Roma thriller
text: Leverkusen's Hernández on Roma thriller Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) "That's just the way football is at times," Javier Hernández told UEFA.com as he reflected on Leverkusen's excitable 4-4 draw against Roma. "That's why I love it." Tuesday's game between Bayer Leverkusen and AS Roma is turning into an early knockout game, as the Italians need the win to keep their options in the UEFA Champions League. Recent related news Roma threw away a two-goal lead late on to draw a thriller with Bayer Leverkusen and leave themselves bottom of Champions League Group E. Javier Hernandez scored... WorldNews 7 hours ago - Front Page BARCELONA win 2-0 with a rare brace from Ivan Rakitic, while Bayer Leverkusen and Roma play out an eight goal thriller in the UEFA Champions League. Herald Sun 8 hours ago - Sports *Leverkusen 4-4 Roma* Goals in the final six minutes from Kevin Kampl and Admir Mehmedi gave the home side an unlikely point in a pulsating contest.
